title: Come enjoy Lincoln NH's Community Health and Fitness Club
subtitle: The Nordic Club offers your health and relxation needs in Lincoln NH
about-subtitle: The Nordic Club is a publicly available condominium resort for those who live or visit the Lincoln NH area.

questions.question: Can I buy a day pass for the Nordic Club?
questions.answer: To ensure there is ample space for existing members should they need it, we do not offer day passes. You are welcome to purchase a single months pass if you are visiting and wish to use our facilities.

questions.question: What are the Nordic Clubs hours?
questions.answer: We are open daily from 8am to 9pm. We are closed on all major holidays.

questions.question: Does the Nordic Club allow guests?
questions.answer: We do allow guests for a small fee. Please see the front-desk staff for assistance.

questions.question: Does the Nordic Club have towel service?
questions.answer: No, we do not provide towels. Please plan accordingly and bring your own towels for pools or saunas.

questions.question: Do you offer any discounts on passes?
questions.answer: Yes! We offer a 10% discount for military service members, veterans, and first responders. Please specify that you qualify for this discount at check-in, and we will ask you to provide proof of service when you are admitted as a member.
